ingredients: 1 can (14.5 oz.) diced tomatoes with juices
1 can (14.5 oz.) diced tomatoes with juices
5 cups fish stock or bottled clam juice
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
1/2 lb. andouille sausage, cut into 1-inch &nbsp slices
1 lb. large shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 cup fresh-cooked crabmeat, picked over &nbsp to remove any shell fragments
2 Tbs. finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley
